Leeds Quant Crim

A group of researchers interested in quantitative criminology. Based at the University of Leeds.

Home About Meetings People

© 2016. All rights reserved.

Welcome to the website for the Leeds-Quant-Crim group. We are a multi-disciplinary group at the University of Leeds who are interested in quantitative criminology.

The group meet about once a month, usually on a Wednesday.

If you would like to be added to the list, please email Nick Malleson
